articles.title: Hawaii governor: An urgent call to action to protect America’s children from measles - Yahoo
articles.description: Dr. Josh Green says HHS “must mount an extensive, science-based vaccination campaign to halt the spread of measles and prevent future tragedies.”
articles.content: Editors note:Dr. Josh Green is the governor of Hawaii. Before being elected governor in 2022, he worked as an emergency room doctor and family physician in Hawaii for over 20 years. While serving as … [+7106 chars]

articles.author: Jennifer Ouellette
articles.title: Monkeys are better yodelers than humans, study finds - Ars Technica
articles.description: Voice breaks in Latin American monkey calls resemble human yodeling, but over a much wider frequency range.
